summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Wavertree & London Pineapple, Coconut & Lime (1 Bar) Review Date: 2020/08/21 Store: Simple Scents Australia Product Description: ['Australian Soapworks Wavertree & London 200g Soap - Pineapple, Coconut & Limeis produced in Australia by dedicated artisan soap makers using the traditional French Milling process. The soaps are wrapped in embossed paper and enriched with pure Organic Shea Butter.Tropical ingredients rejuvenate sun-damaged skin, improving overall skin texture. Lime invigorates the lungs, vitamin C encourages collagen renewal, and coconut fortifies skin and seals in moisture.'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Simple Scents Australia', 'Scent': 'Coconut,Pineapple,Lime', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.9 x 2.5 x 0.8 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B010C79OCA_US', 'Manufacturer': 'Simple Scents Australia'} Review Text: Smells so much better than expected! I got the beach scent for Christmas and liked the quality lathering 🧼 so I was curious to try this one and it smells like just like the Sandals Resorts lotions/soaps which is very lemongrass like. Super pleased. Love the brand and the shipping was super fast. Review Title: So pleased with the smell and quick delivery Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: [Upgrade] FUGACAL Hair Straightener Brush, 30s Fast Heating, 3 Temp Settings, Anti-Scald Design and 30mins Auto-Off, Bring You Ultra Straight Hair with Natural Shiny Look in Minutes Review Date: 2022/03/31 Store: Fugacal Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Fugacal', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Hair Type': 'Thick', 'Product Dimensions': '12.2 x 1.8 x 1.7 inches; 1.79 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'FG-HS01', 'Manufacturer': 'Fugacal'} Review Text: I was very nervous to try this steaming straightener brush. The directions are very thorough so I felt confident. There are a lot of warnings about this product so make sure you read the instructions carefully. Once I did a few hair sections it felt like I had been doing it for years and all my fears were gone. I did not burn myself and my hair came out super smooth and pretty. It’s easy to do a little curl at the end if you rotate your wrist outwards which I like. I would recommend this product! Quick shipping and great packaging Review Title: I am impressed! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: INGRINC Lying Silkworm Eyeliner Pen Shiny Matte Rotatable Highlighter Makeup Eyeshadow Pencil Brighten Bottom-Eyelid Silkworm Makeup Eyeshadow Eyeliner Pen for Women Girls (2,3,5) Review Date: 2022/08/30 Store: INGRINC Product Description: ['1'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Color': '2,3,5', 'Brand': 'INGRINC', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1'} Review Text: Instead of getting #1 I think I got #2 according to the boxes. Ironically number two was the only one that was smooth when applying and the other ones were so dry I couldn’t get any color from them! I attached a picture showing that only a few sparkles managed to stick onto my left eye area. It looks sad.
My right eye was the one I used number two on and it looks better than the other eye but still not great. I imagine if I were to have gotten the correct pen (#1) it would have been just as dry as the other two because it was a glittery one like the #3 & #5…. In my opinion this is not worth the money and I do not recommend. Review Title: Only one pen was semi good Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Folie for Women EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Saffron, Red Fruits, Hedione, Jasmine, Moss, Amber | Perfume, Perfumes for women, Women's fragrances, Fragrance, Womens perfume | by Intense Elite Review Date: 2022/10/20 Store: INTENSE ELITE Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 3.39 x 3.35 inches; 3.4 Ounces'} Review Text: The box is not as bougie as the other ones from this brand presentation wise. The scent is very strong. One squirt a day type strong. The best way to describe this in my opinion is floral /woodsy. I don’t have the most educated nose though. The bottle is beautiful. Very nice but not my favorite from this brand. Review Title: Smells very floral Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Crave Extreme For Men EDP - Eau De Parfum 100ml(3.4 oz) | Pepper, Calabrian Bergamot, Elemi, Vetiver, Pink Pepper, Sichuan Pepper, Patchouli, Lavender, Geranium, Cedar, Ambroxan & Labdanum | Perfume, Perfumes for men, Men's fragrances, Fragrance, Men's eau de parfum | by Intense Elite Review Date: 2022/10/28 Store: INTENSE ELITE Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'INTENSE ELITE', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '100 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Cedar,Floral,Lavender', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '6.18 x 2.95 x 2.76 inches; 3.4 Ounces'} Review Text: Wood scent undertones and isn’t over powering. Presentation across the board is great, packaging A+ for gifts. Review Title: My husband’s fav (he’s tried 4 from this brand) Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LSxia 4PCS Braided Hair Clips for Braids, Four-Leaf Clover Chopped Hairpin Duckbill Clip with 3 Small Hair Clips for Styling, Sparkling Rhinestone Crystal Stone Braided Hair Clip for Women Review Date: 2022/11/13 Store: LSxia Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'LSxia', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Rhinestone', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.06 x 2.68 x 1.34 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LX1117-1'} Review Text: [[VIDEOID:9c72ea2572a53de4ffffdc95b5e81cc1]] I like that it’s something different and it’s not that hard to do. These are fairly well made, and I like the colors and they are functional. The sparkly flowers are hot glued on, so I worry a little bit about the longevity. There are also some white strings coming out from under the flowers like hot glue stings. Review Title: Cute Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband Review Date: 2022/11/18 Store: New Balance Product Description: ['New Balance Unisex Grid Fleece Headband is engineered with comfort and performance in mind. The unique 3D stretch fabric blend allows for total freedom of movement while moving moisture away from the skin quickly for fast drying. These performance accessories feature our New Balance dry and New Balance fresh technology and is your new go-to accessory for any activity.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Package Dimensions L x W x H': '12.01 x 4.29 x 0.55 inches', 'Package Weight': '0.04 Kilograms', 'Brand Name': 'New Balance', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Manufacturer': 'Terramar Sports', 'Size': 'One Size', 'Sport Type': 'Cycling, Skiing, Climbing, Running', 'Date First Available': 'December 18, 2019', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Fabric Type': 'polyester,polyester blend'} Review Text: Not to tight. Warm but not too warm. Soft fabric on inside. Nice quality and appearance 👍🏻 Review Title: Lightweight and soft Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a consistent preference for high-quality, positively aromatic products, favoring items that enhance personal grooming and wellness. A notable trend is the positive sentiment towards body care items with tropical, refreshing scents, indicating a strong inclination towards fragrances that evoke a beach or vacation vibe. They appreciate effective functionality and ease of use, as seen in their experience with beauty tools, emphasizing comfort and quick results.

Quality appears paramount, as evidenced by high ratings for products that deliver superior performance, while they express dissatisfaction when products fall short of expectations, particularly with makeup items that are dry or ineffective. The buyer showcases moderate price sensitivity, likely preferring reasonably priced yet well-made products that balance quality and affordability. 

Their purchasing choices reflect a tendency towards brands that emphasize natural, organic materials, leading to a preference for eco-conscious items. The positive feedback regarding quick shipping and good packaging also suggests that convenience and presentation influence their shopping experiences. Overall, their core preferences are aligned with products that deliver sensory satisfaction, functional excellence, and aesthetic appeal.

target_interaction.title: $12 for one hair treatment 🤑
target_interaction.text: Smells so good and makes my hair so soft! Arrived safely sealed up in plastic. Perfect size for travel. Did not notice any buildup on my scalp. The instructions say to go from mid length of hair to the ends, but I also did my roots and scalp and it was fine. I have thick long hair, so this literally gives me one use, maybe two, if I follow instructions, and only do from mid hair to ends. A tad pricey but you get a great product.

videos.title: Introducing Moroccanoil Color Care Shampoo & Conditioner
